TopicTitle: Way to see flight results after vessel recovery?

Articles.Content:
Heyo, is there any way to see the flight results after you recoverd the vessel?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-03T13:38:05Z" title="04/03/2015 01:38  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 3, 2015</time> by McPoisoned**

Impossible as far as I know. Unless someone made a mod that would log each flight results window on recovery. You can ask for one (if it hasn't been made already) [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/19-General-Add-on-Affairs).
